name: Space Ace
overview: An evil army of enemy space soldiers has invaded a space station. The player, taking the role of the infamous fictional character Lee Enfield, must recover the control of the base, locating and destroying all the enemies. Space Ace is a multi-directional scrolling shooter game also known as a crosshairs shooter where the player must shoot each enemy soldier in a limited amount of time, before that the enemy soldier shoots the player.
